Content: Need to hear some opinions on this. This is in no way definitive, just an idea. What do you guys think of having double emissions for the first 2 months. Half of this would act as normal(10% for notaries, 90% for pos/pow) the other half would be airdropped to KMD. After 2 months we would have ~806k to airdrop to KMD.
